text: Ian McDonald (25 June 1946 â€“ 9 February 2022) was an English multi- instrumental musician. He was best known as a founding member of progressive rock band King Crimson in 1969, and of Foreigner in 1976. McDonald died at his home in New York City, on February 9, 2022, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English songwriters Category:British keyboardists Category:English rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Middlesex Category:Writers from Middlesex
